Text:
What does dual audio mean?
Sorry I don't know.

Animeman1000,

Dual means it has two of something.
Both part 1 and part 2 have English AND Japanese audio. You can change between depending on which you prefer.

If you use VLC player, just right-click on the video and select it under the audio section.

@Workrakken
Yeah thanks. I figured it out, cause it downloaded overnight. It was pretty fast for a torrent that has 1 seed.
